#install.packages("markovchain")

library("markovchain")

a = 0.2
s = 0.6
mcEx1 <- new("markovchain", states = c("m0", "m1", "m2", "m3"),
  transitionMatrix = matrix(data = c(
    0.640000000000000,  0.160000000000000,  0.160000000000000,  0.0400000000000000,
    0.480000000000000,  0.320000000000000,  0.120000000000000,  0.0800000000000000,
    0.480000000000000,  0.120000000000000,  0.320000000000000,  0.0800000000000000,
    0.000000000000000,  0.240000000000000,  0.240000000000000,  0.5200000000000000
  ), 4,4, byrow = TRUE),
  name = "Ex1")
pis = steadyStates(mcEx1)
